00039 //! Read a file in binary format.<br>This class implements the operators and virtual methods of the EFichier class in the following way:<br>The file to read is physically locate on the disk of the machine hosting the master task of the Trio-U application (the process of rank 0 in the "tous" group)<br>and each item read from this file is published to all other processes of the "tous" group.<br>It is the same for the methods of inspection of the state of a file.<br>.SECTION see also
00040 //
00041 class LecFicDiffuseBin : public LecFicDiffuse
00042 {
00043   Declare_instanciable_sans_constructeur(LecFicDiffuseBin);
00044 // the master reads the file et propagates the information
00045 public:
00046   LecFicDiffuseBin()
00047   {
00048     set_bin(1);
00049   };
00050   LecFicDiffuseBin(const char* name,IOS_OPEN_MODE mode=ios::in)
00051   {
00052     set_bin(1);
00053     ouvrir(name,mode);
00054   };
00055 };
00056 
00057 #endif
